select s.id as id, i.name as projectName, s.device_no as deviceNo, s.project_id as projectId, s.gprs as gprs, s.identifier as identifier, s.specification as specification, s.owner as owner, s.manufactor as manufactor, if(s.is_online=1,'在线',"离线") as onlineName, if(s.status=1,'开启','关闭') as statusName, s.place_point as placePoint, s.comments as comments, s.is_del as isDel, s.create_time as createTime, u.name as createUserName, s.name as name, s.pm10 as pm10,s.pm25 as pm25 from t_project_spray s left join t_project_info i on i.id=s.project_id left join t_sys_user u on u.id=s.create_user where s.is_del=0 and s.id=#{id}

select device_no as deviceNo,identifier,status as status,is_online as isOnline from t_project_spray where is_del=0 and id in (select spray_id from t_project_spray_bind where environment_id =(select id from t_project_environment_monitor where device_no=#{deviceNo}))
